event.title: box office collection and first week total collection
event.description:
Vivegam (2017)Friday Collection Movie

Vivegam will be the 3’rd biggest collection holder of the year 2017, there were millions of fans of Ajith Kumar waiting for Vivegam will finally get to see audiences are curious to know the hit Flim Vivegam. Vivegam (2017) is based on a indian spy thriller Film co-written and directed by Siva , with Vivek Oberoi, Kajal Aggarwal and Akshara Haasan playing the supporting roles and Music Directored By Anirudh Ravichander.

Vivegam (2017) movie 24 August India
Vivegam (2017) movie Run time 2h 23m
Morning Collection of Vivegam coming soon
